is_mammal: Is it a mammal (like a dog or a human)?
is_reptile: Is it a reptile (like a snake or lizard)?
is_amphibian: Is it an amphibian (like a frog)?
is_insect: Is it an insect (with six legs)?
is_arachnid: Is it a spider or scorpion (with eight legs)?
is_crustacean: Is it a crustacean (like a crab or lobster)?
is_mollusc: Is it a mollusc (like a snail or octopus)?
is_tiny: Is it very tiny, smaller than your hand?
is_small: Is it small, about the size of a cat?
is_medium: Is it medium-sized, like a big dog?
is_large: Is it large, like a person or a horse?
is_very_large: Is it very large, like a car or an elephant?
is_massive: Is it truly gigantic, like a whale?
is_vertebrate: Does it have a backbone inside its body?
is_invertebrate: Does it NOT have a backbone?
is_warm_blooded: Does it make its own body heat (warm-blooded)?
is_cold_blooded: Does its body get warm or cold with the weather?
has_gills_for_breathing: Does it breathe underwater with gills?
has_lungs_for_breathing: Does it breathe air with lungs, like you do?
hibernates_or_enters_torpor: Does it sleep through the entire winter?
is_bioluminescent: Can it make its own light and glow in the dark?
has_fur_or_hair: Is it covered in fur or hair?
has_scales: Does it have scales, like a fish or a snake?
has_leathery_or_slimy_skin: Does it have smooth, slimy, or leathery skin?
has_hard_exoskeleton: Does it have a hard shell on the outside of its body, like a beetle?
has_shell: Does it have a shell it can hide in, like a turtle or a snail?
has_fins: Does it have fins for swimming?
has_claws_paws_or_talons: Does it have claws, paws, or sharp talons?
has_hooves: Does it have hooves, like a horse?
has_horns_or_antlers: Does it have horns or antlers on its head?
has_distinct_beak_or_bill: Does it have a beak or a bill instead of a mouth with teeth?
has_tusks: Does it have long, pointy teeth called tusks?
has_tentacles_or_arms: Does it have tentacles or wiggly arms, like an octopus?
has_prehensile_tail: Can it grab things using its tail?
has_two_legs: Does it walk on two legs?
has_four_legs: Does it walk on four legs?
has_six_legs: Does it have exactly six legs?
has_eight_legs: Does it have exactly eight legs?
has_more_than_eight_legs: Does it have more than eight legs?
has_compound_eyes: Does it have big eyes made of tiny little dots, like a fly?
has_segmented_body: Is its body made of different parts joined together, like a caterpillar?
long_and_slender_body: Is its body long and skinny, like a noodle or a snake?
compact_and_stout_body: Is its body round and chunky, like a potato or a pig?
radially_symmetrical_body: Is its body shaped like a star or a circle?
primarily_walks_or_runs: Does it mostly move by walking or running around?
primarily_climbs: Is it a great climber of trees or rocks?
primarily_swims: Does it spend most of its life swimming?
primarily_flies_or_glides: Does it spend most of its time flying or gliding in the air?
primarily_burrows_or_digs: Does it live underground or spend a lot of time digging?
is_sessile_as_adult: As a grown-up, does it stay stuck in one spot for its whole life?
moves_by_jumping_or_leaping: Is it famous for hopping or jumping?
is_terrestrial: Does it live only on land?
is_aquatic: Does it live only in the water?
is_semi_aquatic: Does it live both in water AND on land, like a frog?
is_arboreal: Does it live most of its life up in the trees?
is_fossorial: Does it live most of its life underground?
lives_in_freshwater: Does it live in a river or a lake (fresh water)?
lives_in_marine_water: Does it live in the big, salty ocean?
lives_in_polar_regions: Does it live in a very cold, snowy place like the North or South Pole?
lives_in_forests_or_woodlands: Does it live in a forest with lots of trees?
lives_in_grasslands_or_savannas: Does it live in an open, grassy field with few trees?
lives_in_deserts_or_arid_regions: Does it live in a hot, dry desert?
common_in_urban_areas: Do you often see it in cities or towns where people live?
is_omnivore: Does it eat both plants and meat?
is_insectivore: Does it mostly eat bugs and insects?
is_filter_feeder: Does it eat by sucking tiny food out of the water?
is_scavenger: Does it eat animals that are already dead?
eats_nectar_pollen_or_fruit: Does it eat sweet flower nectar, pollen, or fruit?
is_parasitic: Does it live on another animal and bother it, like a flea on a dog?
gives_live_birth: Does it give birth to live babies instead of laying eggs?
undergoes_metamorphosis: Does it completely change its body as it grows, like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly?
provides_extensive_parental_care: Do its parents take great care of their babies for a long time?
has_no_parental_care: Do its babies have to take care of themselves as soon as they are born?
carries_young_in_pouch: Does it carry its babies in a pouch on its belly?
is_highly_social_or_eusocial: Does it live in a big, busy family or colony, like bees or ants?
lives_in_small_groups_or_pairs: Does it live with just a small family or a partner?
is_solitary: Does it usually live all by itself?
is_territorial: Does it protect its own special area from other animals?
is_apex_predator: Is it a top hunter that no other animals hunt?
uses_camouflage_or_mimicry: Can it hide by blending in or looking like something else?
uses_armor_or_spines_for_defense: Does it protect itself with a hard shell or sharp spikes?
releases_noxious_chemicals: Does it spray a stinky smell to protect itself?
relies_on_speed_to_escape: Is it super fast so it can run away from danger?
is_domesticated: Is it an animal that people keep as a pet or on a farm?
migrates_seasonally: Does it travel a very long way every year for winter or summer?
builds_complex_structures: Is it known for building things, like a nest, a web, or a dam?
uses_tools: Is it smart enough to use tools, like using a rock to open a shell?
communicates_with_complex_vocalizations: Does it make a lot of different sounds, like songs or special calls, to 'talk'?
is_nocturnal: Is it mostly awake and active at night?
is_diurnal: Is it mostly awake and active during the day?
